import React, { useCallback, useState } from 'react' import { FooterContainer, FooterInfoWrapper, FooterH1, FooterH3, FooterEmail, FooterContactWrapper, Contact1, EmailInput, Contact2, ShareH2, VisitH2, ShareH3, VisitH3, EmailBtn} from './FooterElements' import { Form } from 'antd'; import TitleUnderline from '../../images/shape-titleunderline.png'; import emailTextfield from '../../images/textfield-email.png' import kakao from '../../images/img-kakao.png' import facebook from '../../images/img-facebook.png' import url from '../../images/img-url.png' import youtube from '../../images/img-youtube.png' import emailBtn from '../../images/btn-next.png' import Link from 'next/link'; const Footer = (props) => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const onChangeEmail = (e) =>{ setEmail(e.target.value); } const onSubmit = () => { console.log(email); setEmail(""); } return ( <>
Contact 이메일을 입력하시면 블루닷에 대한 자세한 정보받을 수 있습니다. share 블루닷의 소식을 친구에게 공유해보세요
visit 블루닷의 유튜브를 방문해보세요
) } export default Footer
